title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Determine the specific needs of the ThoughtToTextTranslator system, including user requirements, functional requirements, and non-functional requirements.

title: Design BCI System Architecture
description: Create a high-level design for the ThoughtToTextTranslator system, focusing on hardware, software, and communication aspects.

title: Develop Brain Signal Processing Algorithms
description: Create algorithms to interpret brain signals and translate them into text.

title: Develop Text Generation Module
description: Create a module to convert processed brain signals into coherent written text.

title: Design User Interface
description: Create an intuitive and accessible interface for users to interact with the ThoughtToTextTranslator system.

title: Implement BCI System
description: Develop the ThoughtToTextTranslator system based on the defined architecture, algorithms, and user interface.

title: Test ThoughtToTextTranslator System
description: Perform functional and non-functional testing to ensure the system meets requirements and is reliable.

title: Document ThoughtToTextTranslator System
description: Create technical documentation for the ThoughtToTextTranslator system.
